text: Arau raja'i (edinakhana) ka’le, ‘ma'i saponata dekhilo, satajani hrsta-pusta ga'i, sihamtaka ana satajani ksina gaye bhaksana karaiche arau dekhilo satota sajira siha lagate ana satota sukana siha. He paraisadabarga! Yadi tomaloke saponara byakhya karaiba paraa tente mora saponara bisaye abhimata diya’
